page.title: 08Local News Story,Meltham
page.content: A Report from the Holme Valley Express of 17/5/85: Mr Peter Middleton,the headmaster of Meltham School,hit back at suggestions that a school swimming pool could be used by the public. Mr Middleton was replying to suggestions made at an annual Meltham Town Council meeting that the pool should be thrown open to the public."The design made it unsuitable for leisure use by either secondary age children or adults.Perhaps Mr Hilton,who made the suggestion, would like to visit the school to see the pool for himself before making further erroneous comments," he added.Twenty years ago the school amenities committee raised the money to build a learner pool as an extra facility for the school with no financial help from the then West Riding Authority.
